page.title: 01Kelly Hamlet West Devon
page.content: Kelly hamlet nestles around Kelly House and church occupying approx a 1/4 km sq. Well woooded & unspoilt either side of a single track metalled road. Surrounding countryside undulat- ing. St Mary's church 13th C with tower contains original font. Stained glass dated 1867 are memorials to Edmund Kelly,founder of Kelly College College, Tavistock. The war memorial stands in the churchyard commerating both World Wars. Kelly vault under family pews. 11 other detached houses, 5 of which built in 20th century, one owned by (rose) nurseryman with mail order business.Residents' occupation include architects,architects draugh- tsmen, hospitals, a telecommunication engineer working abroad, quarry lab technician,factory & riding instructor There are 3 retired couples, no village shop, nearest PO Lifton.
